name: Peak flow capacity
functionStatement: Peak flows reshape channel without chronic instability, redistribute wood and sediment, reset habitats, and supply nutrients to floodplains.
descriptionMarkdown: Bankfull shear stress fits substrate/banks, indicating stable capacity.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compare bankfull width and depth to regional curves for drainage area and slope and flag large departures.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Channel dimensions align with regional curves and are stable through moderate floods.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Severe mismatch with repeated destructive floods or bank failures.

references: USGS/NRCS regional bankfull geometry reports (where available)
